oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (KWTX) - 1946-mm-dd
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show for KWTX, Waco, Texas with announcer Robert Charles.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- Opening statement (Robert Charles) -- I Wish I Had Never Met Sunshine (Hank Thompson) -- Kentucky Waltz (Hank Thompson) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Detour (Hank Thompson) -- Hank Thompson talks -- It's Been So Long Darling (Hank Thompson talks) -- Robert Charles talks -- Swing Wide Your Gate Of Love (Hank Thompson) -- Robert Charles talks -- I'll Have To Live And Learn (Hank Thompson) -- Closing statement (Robert Charles) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KWTX (Radio station : Waco, Tex.); Thompson, Hank; Charles, Robert (Announcer)
